EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when a survey is completed
EmailTemplate.name: Survey Completion
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for participating in the DEDSI Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SurveyInvitation.Contact_First_Name_MVN__c},
Thank you for participating in the Diabetic Eye Disease Screening Initiative. We received your survey and appreciate your feedback.
This concludes our services with you. However, if you ever have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at 1-800-123-4567.
Your coordinator's name: {!SurveyInvitation.Care_Plan_Owner_Full_Name_MVN__c}
Sincerely, Your friends at DEDSI
